Welcome to District II
----------------------

To contact your Council Member, please email,
phone,
or submit an
onlin
e message.
I welcome your comments and look forward to
hearing from you.

1110 Houston Street
Laredo, TX 78040
Office:     956-791-7385

Email:      clara@ci.laredo.tx.us
